    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>bdbc3ea0-f020-47fa-bd96-f53969871fcb#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Görög harcos</string>
            <string language="en">Greek Warrior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechischer Krieger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerrier Grec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerreiro Grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guerriero Greco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικός πολεμιστής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guerrero Griego</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Görög harcos bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction of Greek Warrior</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Thermopülai-szoros,  Marathón,  Athén,  Théba,  Szalamisz,  Milétosz,  Spárta,  Mükéné,  Trója,  Délosz,  Kréta,  Peloponnészosz,  Attika,  Égei-tenger,  </string>
            <string language="en">Strait Thermopüla,  Marathon,  Athen,  Théba,  Salamis,  Miletos,  Sparta,  Mükene,  Troja,  Delos,  Creta,  Peloponnesos,  Attika,  Aegean-sea,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung des griechischen Kriegers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction du guerrier grec</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução do guerreiro grego</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione del guerriero greco</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή του ελληνικού πολεμιστή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción del guerrero griego</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Straße Thermopüla, Marathon, Athen, Théba, Salamis, 
Miletos, Sparta, Mükene, Troja, Delos, Creta, Peloponnesos, Attika, 
Ägäisch-Meer,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détroit Thermopüla, Marathon, Athen, Théba, Salamis, 
Miletos, Sparta, Mükene, Troja, Delos, Creta, Peloponnesos, Attika, 
Égéen-mer,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Strait Thermopüla, Marathon, Athen, Théba, Salamis, 
Miletos, Sparta, Mükene, Troja, Delos, Creta, Peloponnesos, Attika, 
Aegean-mar,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strait Thermopüla, Maratona, Athen, Théba, Salami,
Miletos, Sparta, Mükene, Troja, Delos, Creta, Peloponnesos, Attika, 
Aegean-mare,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στενό Thermopόla, μαραθώνιος, Athen, Thιba, 
σαλάμια, Miletos, Sparta, Mόkene, Troja, Delos, 
Creta, Peloponnesos, Αττική, αιγαίος-θάλασσα,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrecho Thermopüla, Maratón, Athen, Théba, 
Salamis, Miletos, Sparta, Mükene, Troja, Delos, Creta, Peloponnesos, 
Attika, Egeo-mar,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
